Class Outcome

java.lang.Object
  Outcome

public class Outcome
extends java.lang.Object

This class will determine when the game has ended and whether the game is a win or a loss, it also displays a message depending on the outcome(win or loss) of the game.

Version:
(3-18-09)
Author:
(Taylor Douthitt)

Constructor Summary
Outcome()
          Constructor for object of class Outcome.
 
Method Summary
 boolean endGame()
          This method will run through the Array holding the peg objects, the method will loop through the array testing to see if each peg can move, if a peg may move endGame is false indicating acceptable moves are available, if none of the pegs may move then endGame is true indicating the game is over.
 boolean isWinner()
          this method determines whether the game is a win or a loss depending on the number of pegs left on the board when endGame is found to be true.
 void message()
          this method will display a message depending on the Outcome found in isWinner, if isWinner is true it displays a win message and if false it will display a loss message.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Outcome

public Outcome()
Constructor for object of class Outcome.

Method Detail

endGame

public boolean endGame()
This method will run through the Array holding the peg objects, the method will loop through the array testing to see if each peg can move, if a peg may move endGame is false indicating acceptable moves are available, if none of the pegs may move then endGame is true indicating the game is over.

Returns:
false if acceptable moves available, true if no moves available

isWinner

public boolean isWinner()
this method determines whether the game is a win or a loss depending on the number of pegs left on the board when endGame is found to be true.

Returns:
false if pegs on board exceed one, true if pegs on board are one

message

public void message()
this method will display a message depending on the Outcome found in isWinner, if isWinner is true it displays a win message and if false it will display a loss message.
